channel.title: Man help
channel.description: Idk if this is the right section, but my mopar account me and a 'buddy' was hosting about 4 months ago he went physco cause i got 50$+ in donors, changed password to my mopar acc, paypal, ect, Now i made a new source i want to host, but cant, because it still says my ip is online when that ip address isnt logged on i made a new one and everything, and it will not let me post it because my old ip on my old account my cunt friend stole is still up...i cant even edit it.. Any suggestions.?

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

It as off at like 3 months one time cause i figure it would go off and delete itself, but it only made it to 69%…

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I must admit that is pretty low, he’s using you as a way to keep his uptime on. I suggest you turn off your server for a bit and see after like 30 minutes if it makes HIS server status page go offline. If it does, you may be able to start your own on a different port, and he’ll be left in the dust.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

I tried recovering, he chaged the email and everything, and thats old pictures ect, his site, his everything, so im screwed. Cant edit/post a new one…

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well there’s the problem. Your friends no-ip currently points to YOUR computer. This means as long as you keep your server online, his wont go offline. Your best bet is to try and recover your old account.

I don’t see why he would do this though, as it still gives you almost complete control…

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

iv portforwarded, my friend can get on ect, and the no-ip i use is erasedpkzyou.no-ip.biz, i miss understood you a sec ago i think, and i got 74.196.124.218.

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You don’t need to do that command. As for your IP address, that’s your LAN address, which is used for port forwarding, not making a server status page. If you’ve port forwarded before, go to whatsmyip.com and use the address it gives you to create a no-ip. If you haven’t port forwarded, I suggested you follow the tutorials in the tutorial section, and then do the previous step.

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

iv tried, but when i use the command, ipconfig/ release it says 'no operation can be performed on local connection while it has a media devise disconnected. And i have no clue wtf its talking about. and my ip is 192.168.0.150

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You need the IP of the computer that you are hosting your server on, yes. You may want to make a new no-ip address for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

He has the account, iy was originally mine. But he changed the shit. And im hosting from my computer, and is it my ip that you neeed?

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Do you still have the account that controls this no-ip:
rabitsmoke.no-ip.biz

If so, you can change it to some random IP that doesn’t point to the same place as your server, and then his will go offline.
If not, then he probably already changed it to a new IP, but let’s test.
The IP I get when I ping it is:
74.196.124.218

Do you know what the IP of the server you are trying to host now is? Or, what is the IP of the server you are trying to submit to the server status page right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

The account is mine that he posted with, he just took it and changed the password, but heres the page.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=rabitsmoke.no-ip.biz

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ok well if he posted it under a different account, can you link us to the status page link? Then we can see what no-ip he is using.

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

Ohkay i posted under my name, not this one another, he changed the pass word and shit to it.
And idk im dumbfounded thats why im asking for help, i change no-ip’ds but it still says its online…

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t see how this works.

If it’s posted under your account, you should be able to edit it now that you have your password.
If it’s posted under your ip-address, that means it must be running on your computer, and you can shut it off.
I’m not sure how the DNS redirects work, but if you had a No-Ip or other redirect that he stole the name of, I think the server status page will look at the IP it redirects to, not the name, so that shouldn’t be a problem.

If you can explain a bit better I may be able to help more.

Read full topic

item.title: Man help
item.dc:creator: @i_stake_i i stake i
item.description:
@i_stake_i wrote:

I did, and you havent replied.

Read full topic
